Function reference

All functions

editry
editry
er_add_ffmpeg_path()
Add the path to ffmpeg to the system path
er_audio_track()
Audio track
er_exec_docker()
Execute editly in docker image

Execute editly
er_ffmpeg_exe()
Path to the ffmpeg executable
er_install_editly()
Install the editly node package
er_install_ffmpeg()
Install ffmpeg
er_layer() er_clip() er_defaults() er_header()
Create various sections of an editly spec
er_layer_pause() er_layer_image() er_layer_image_overlay() er_layer_title() er_layer_subtitle() er_layer_title_background() er_layer_news_title() er_layer_slide_in_text() er_layer_fill_color() er_layer_radial_gradient() er_layer_linear_gradient() er_layer_rainbow_colors() er_layer_video() er_layer_audio() er_layer_detached_audio()
Standard layer types
er_spec()
Create a spec ready for compiling to video
er_theme_default()
Default editry theme

Convert editly spec to JSON string
